biography:
From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia.

Joseph Eggleston "Joe" Johnston II  (born May 13, 1950) is an American film director and former effects artist best known for such hit movies as Honey I Shrunk the Kids, Jumanji, The Rocketeer,  Jurassic Park III, Hidalgo, The Wolfman, October Sky,  and the upcoming Captain America: The First Avenger.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Joe Johnston, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
name: Joe Johnston
